properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 7:43AM CST until February 9 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Black Warrior River At Holt Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...Hale...
Marengo and Tuscaloosa Counties.
Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo...Sumter and Tuscaloosa Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of three to four inches with locally heavier
amounts have fallen over the Black Warrior basin...and a flood
warning is now in effect for much of the river.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam.
* from this afternoon to Sunday morning...or until the Warning is
cancelled.
* At  6:30 AM Thursday The stage Was 120.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 129 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue to
rise to near 136.5 feet by Friday evening. The river will fall
below flood stage by Saturday night.
* Impact...At 1350 feet...Numerous camphouses and some permanent
residences southwest of Tuscaloosa become cutoff. Flooding of
lowlands in the area will occur.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
